So here, I have been getting asked about NFT a lot and what it means. 

Full meaning
 NFT: Non-Fungible Tokens 

An NFT is a digital asset that exists on a blockchain, a record of transactions kept on networked computers. Powered by blockchain technology and very transparent 😉.

"POV can solve today’s NFT challenges by creating a transparent and immutable record of the NFT across its lifespan, from the way in which it was created, moved, modified and stored, to its possible destruction.."
